property.name: dregion_Ipnumber
property.value: insert into dregion_Ipnumber values(?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE ipNum=?

property.name: dregion_sessionNum
property.value: insert into dregion_sessionNum values(?,?,?,?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE sessionCount=?,sessionOutCount=?,rate=?

property.name: depth_num
property.value: insert into depth_num values(?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE count=?

property.name: ordersuccess_num
property.value: insert into ordersuccess_num values(?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE successCount=?

property.name: order_retreat
property.value: insert into order_retreat values(?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE retreatCount=?

property.name: order_number_money
property.value: insert into order_number_money values(?,?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE orderCount=?,orderMoney=?
